title: Otis shares the secrets to controlling elevators for robots
description:
Otis developed APIs allowing autonomous robots to communicate with and navigate elevators in commercial buildings.

The post Otis shares the secrets to controlling elevators for robots appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
